誙字的基本解释

誙
kēng
语言确实。
〔誙誙〕一定要取得的样子，如“举群趋者，誙誙然如将不得已。”
粗。

誙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kēng］
［《廣韻》口莖切，平耕，溪。］
见“誙誙”

誙字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　誙； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1162第17
【廣韻】口莖切【集韻】【韻會】丘耕切，?音鏗。【玉篇】觕也。【增韻】言確也。　又【類篇】誙誙，趨死貌。【莊子·至樂篇】吾觀俗之所樂，舉羣趨者，誙誙然如將不得已，而皆曰樂者，吾未之樂也。　又【集韻】何耕切，音莖。又下頂切，音婞。又【正韻】丘庚切，音坑。義?同。

誙字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
誙字的起名意思

暂无。

You
Basic explanation of words
You
kēng
The language is indeed.
〔誙誙] Must obtain the appearance, such as "A group of people who are eager to go, they are like a last resort."
Crude.
You
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kēng］
["Guangyun" Cut the mouth and stem, plow, and stream. ]
See "Xin Yu"
You
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　誙; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1162 Page 17
[Guang Yun] Mouth Stem Cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Qiu Geng cut,? Yin Keng. 【Jade articles】Rough. [By rhyme] The words are true.　[Classes] again, it looks like a dead end. [Zhuangzi·Zhu Le Chapter] I observe the joys of the common folks, and those who gather in the crowd are like a last resort, and all are joyful, and I am not happy.　[Jiyun] He Gengqie, sound stem. Next cut again, Yinhui. [Zheng Yun] Qiu Geng cut, sound pit. Righteous? Same.
